refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Computes the probability distribution function of the Noncentral Chi-squared distribution function.
Any scalar input argument is expanded to a matrix of doubles of the same size as the other input arguments.
Caution This distribution is known to have inferior accuracy in some cases.
where f_{k+2i} is the chi-squared probability density function with k+2i degrees of freedom.
